dt2.14:1.1: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:1.2: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:1.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:2.6: manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:2.7: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:2.9: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:3.5: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:3.7: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:4.8: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:4.10: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi, ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:5.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:5.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:6.5: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.14:8.7: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
